title: Akshay Kumar:Despite Being Unwell, Akshay Kumar Attends Annual Kudo Championship In Surat To Motivate The Kids
text:
There is everything inspirational about him. Akshay Kumar is one actor who takes his fitness to another level and is admired by the world. And this time again he proved why fitness is extremely prominent in his life.

The actor who has had a hectic schedule is under the weather but despite being unwell he attended the 11th Akshay Kumar International Kudo tournament in Surat, Gujarat to motivate the kids out there.

Twitter

Talking about this event, Akshay tweeted, “Feeling a little under the weather today but made it to XIth Akshay Kumar International Invitational Kudo Tournament in Surat. And I’m so glad I did, to see such little champions, not just participate but excel..made it all worthwhile. Thank you to all the kids & their parents”.

Feeling a little under the weather today but made it to XIth Akshay Kumar International Invitational Kudo Tournament in Surat 👊🏻And I’m so glad I did, to see such little champions, not just participate but excel..made it all worthwhile. Thank you to all the kids & their parents pic.twitter.com/tJHprR4vxt — Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar) October 24, 2019

Don't Miss 26.1 K SHARES 22.3 K SHARES 8 K SHARES 11 K SHARES

Isn't’ that just too inspirational about him?

Twitter

Akshay who has always been vocal about his discipline towards fitness spoke about the importance of it at the event, “Karate is me. I am Akshay because of Karate. I owe it my life, my career, my reason for being the disciplined action hero that I am. I think karate should be made compulsory in schools so that children have the ability to defend and discipline themselves.” And we totally agree with the Khiladi Kumar.

Twitter

He even shared the initiative he is a part of on promoting Karate internationally, “ I got a special opportunity. My father let me practice. Now, I want to be like a father to those who are not as fortunate. I wish I could do more. Right now I am funding, feeding, supporting and organising this tournament to find the best so they can compete internationally and boost karate in India”.

There is a reason why he is the most loved and celebrated actor.
